title: Used to work for an Insurance Company but did not know it was haram, what to do with my savings
transcript: from india says uh he used to work for an insurance company and after a while he resigned and he had savings and he came to know lately that working in an insurance company is haram so he's asking what should i do with the savings nothing you can use them whatever income you had made in the past while thinking that your job was permissible in halal this income is halal for you it becomes haram after the day you came to know that you should not be working in such a job this is when whatever income you make afterwards becomes haram for you and allah azzawajal knows best
